short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for managing tokens and interacting with apps on the OP_NET Bitcoin Layer 1 Metaprotocol.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OP_WALLET is a powerful browser-based extension designed for seamless management of tokens and interactions on the OP_NET Bitcoin Layer 1 Metaprotocol.

With OP_WALLET, users can explore the decentralized world of OP_NET, mint and trade tokens, access DeFi applications, and manage various OP_20 tokens directly from their browser.

Its intuitive interface provides secure, easy-to-use access to essential features like transaction history, contract interactions, and asset overview, all powered by Bitcoin’s unmatched security.

Whether you’re new to blockchain or a seasoned developer, OP_WALLET simplifies token management on OP_NET, making it an essential tool for navigating the future of decentralized applications on Bitcoin.

Install OP_WALLET today to securely manage and expand your digital assets in the OP_NET ecosystem.
